1.title: Cages for collecting plastic bottles
tag: Street cages have been installed where used plastic bottles can be thrown away, pre-cleaned and crumpled to a flat state or twisted to take up less space.
The collected plastic is sent for recycling and reuse.

2.title: Boxes for collecting used batteries and disposable e-cigarettes
tag: Used batteries contain a number of dangerous toxic components, such as lead, manganese, lithium, and zinc.
If they are dumped in conventional landfills instead of being recycled, the toxins begin to poison water and soil, as well as plants growing nearby.
Disposable e-cigarettes pose no less of a threat to the environment, as their consumption has increased dramatically in recent years, aggravating the problem of their disposal.

3_1.title: Containers for waste sorting
tag: Containers for waste sorting (bio, metal, glass, plastic, waste paper and other waste) are installed.
Sorting helps to turn waste into a resource: to make things or energy from it, and to reduce the number of landfills, and thus protect ecosystems from destruction.

3_2.title: Подрібнювач Харчових Відходів
tag: The food court also has a food waste shredder under the sink - an eco-friendly solution for recycling leftovers.

4.title: Recycling Center
tag: Here, used and collected waste paper and stretch wrap are pressed into compact bales, which reduces their volume by several times.
This helps to free up storage space. This makes it easier to transport recyclables for further processing and reuse.

5.title: Containers for waste sorting
tag: Containers for waste sorting (bio, metal, glass, plastic, waste paper and other waste) are installed.
Sorting helps to turn waste into a resource: to make things or energy from it, and to reduce the number of landfills, and thus protect ecosystems from destruction.

9.title: Kaizen park
tag: This is our Office's green lungs, where you can relax in a natural area during a break or hold a working meeting in the open air.
There are pedestrian walkways and benches with a canopy.
Trees in the park create a cozy atmosphere and a pleasant shade from the sun. Green spaces have a positive impact on the urban climate, retain dust and gases, and thus contribute to air purification.
